name: (I Can't Believe It's) Mashed Cauliflower
author: MISSJACKIE
summary: A tasty alternative to mashed potatoes that is lower in carbohydrates, sodium, and saturated fat than typical mashed potato recipes.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon garlic and herb seasoning blend (such as Mrs. Dash®), or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan
Add cauliflower, reduce heat to medium-low, place a cover on saucepan, and cook cauliflower until tender, about 10 minutes; drain
Set cauliflower aside to cool for about 5 minutes; transfer to a blender
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir onion and garlic in hot oil until tender, 3 to 5 minutes
Set aside to cool for about 5 minutes; add to blender
Pour yogurt into blender with cauliflower and onion mixture; blend until smooth
Season with parsley and garlic and herb seasoning to serve
